stockmarket.controller

Class VirtualGambleControllerGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • stockmarket.controller.VirtualGambleControllerGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Features

    public class VirtualGambleControllerGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements Features
    This is a GUI Controller Class which implements the Features Interface. It implements all the operations mandated by the Features Interface.
